xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 10 Mahantaraduka » 10.14 Upādinnaduka » 10.14.3 Paccayavāra » 10.14.3.1 Paccayānuloma » 10.14.3.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
Mahantaraduka
Upādinnaduka
Paccayavāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Hetu
434.
3413Upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā upādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  upādinnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe upādinnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā kaṭattā ca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  khandhe paccayā vatthu, vatthuṃ paccayā khandhā, ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe…  mahābhūte paccayā kaṭattārūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā upādinnā khandhā. (1)
3414Upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  upādinne khandhe paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, vatthuṃ paccayā anupādinnā khandhā. (2)
3415Upādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā upādinno ca anupādinno ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā—  upādinnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe… . (3)
3416Anupādinnaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  anupādinnaṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paccayā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe…  mahābhūte paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ upādārūpaṃ. (1)
3417Upādinnañca anupādinnañca dhammaṃ paccayā anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  upādinne khandhe ca mahābhūte ca paccayā cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ, anupādinnaṃ ekaṃ khandhañca vatthuñca paccayā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe ca…pe… . (1)
